title: Public transport for Run For The Kids: Sunday 17 March 2024
articleContent:
Public transport for Run For The Kids: Sunday 17 March 2024

Extra Public Transport will be running early to assist you to get to the start of the race course to attend the Herald Sun/Transurban Run for the Kids.

The Long course zone’s will begin from 8am to 8:40am.

The Short course zone’s will begin from 9:30am to 9:50am

Please visit the Run for the Kids website for further event information.

Before you travel

Passengers, please note there will be disruptions on the MTM network for Sandringham, Belgrave, Lilydale, Pakenham, Mernda Lines, with bus replacements running for passengers.

There will be disruptions on the VLine network for Seymour and Shepparton Lines, with bus replacements running for passengers.

There will also be disruptions on the Yarra Trams network for Routes 6 and 16, with bus replacements running for passengers.

Plan your journey using Journey planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

 Metropolitan train

Forward service to Flinders Street Station:

  • Lilydale – Leaving at 6:24am & 7:43am arriving at 7:23am & 8:42am
  • Glen Waverley – Leaving at 6:29am & 8:14am arriving at 7:03am & 8:49am

Passengers are advised to connect to services travelling to Southern Cross Station.

Forward service to Southern Cross Station

  • Eltham – Leaving at 6:41am & 8:06am arriving at 7:15am & 9:03am
  • Mernda – Leaving at 6:16am & 8:04am arriving at 7:32am & 8:58am
  • Dandenong – Leaving at 6:07am & 7:27am arriving at 7:31am & 8:41am
  • Frankston – Leaving at 6:05am & 7:48am arriving at 7:17am & 9:02am
  • Upfield – Leaving at 6:58am & 8:18am arriving at 7:29am & 8:49am
  • Craigieburn – Leaving at 6:32am & 8:27am arriving at 7:11am & 9:06am
  • Werribee – Leaving at 6:30am & 8:17am arriving at 7:08am & 8:55am
  • Sunbury – Leaving at 6:36am & 7:58am arriving at 7:18am & 8:40am

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

 Metropolitan tram

Getting to Docklands

Due to road closures for Run for the Kids, there will be tram service changes.

  • The following Routes will be affected
    • Route 11 – West Preston to Victoria Harbour Docklands
    • Route 12 – St Kilda to Victoria Gardens
    • Route 30 – St Vincent’s Plaza to Central Pier Docklands
    • Route 35 – City Circle
    • Route 48 – North Balwyn to Victoria Harbour Docklands
    • Route 58 – West Coburg to Toorak
    • Route 70 – Wattle Park to Waterfront City
    • Route 75 – Vermont South to Waterfront City
    • Route 86 – Bundoora to Waterfront City Docklands
    • Route 96 – East Brunswick to St Kilda Beach
    • Route 109 – Box Hill to Port Melbourne

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

 Regional train

Getting to Docklands

Normal services arrive and depart from Southern Cross Station.

Plan your journey using Journey planner.

Metropolitan bus

Due to road closures for Run for the Kids, there will be bus service changes.

The following Routes will be affected:

  • Route 216 – Sunshine Station - City (Queen St)
  • Route 220 – Sunshine Station – City via Footscray Road
  • Route 232 – Altona North – City (Queen Victoria Market)
  • Route 234 – Garden City – City (Queen Victoria Market)
  • Route 235 – City (Southern Cross Station) – Fishermans Bend via Williamstown Road
  • Route 605 – Gardenvale – City (Queen Street)

Route 216 Sunshine Station - City (Queen St)

Services will divert via Dudley and Williams Streets to terminate and commence from the Queen Victoria Market in A’Beckett Street, and not service sections of Spenser, Lonsdale and Queen Streets, from first service to 2:30pm.

  • Flinders Lane/Queen St (ID20459)

Route 232 – Altona North – City (Queen Victoria Market)

Services will divert via Todd Road and Wharf Road in both directions to terminate and commence from Fishermans Bend and not service sections of Collins Street and Queen Street, from first service to 2:30pm.

Route 235 – City (Southern Cross Station) – Fishermans Bend via Williamstown Road

Services to Fishermans Bend will commence from Port Melbourne Cricket Ground Stop ID6514 on Williamstown Road and not service Southern Cross Station and sections of Normanby Road, from first service to 2:30pm.

Route 605 – Gardenvale – City (Queen Street)

Services will divert via Punt Road, Albert Street and Lonsdale Street to Queen Street in both directions and not service sections of the Botanical Gardens, City Road, Queensbridge Street and Queen Street, from 8am to 12pm.

The following bus stops will not be serviced during this time:

  • Melbourne Girls Grammar/Anderson St (South Yarra) ID 51140
  • Domain Rd/Birdwood Ave (South Yarra) ID 51146

Road closures

There will be a number of road closures throughout the duration of the event. For a full list of road closures and traffic diversions, visit the Run for the Kids website.
articleDescription: Public transport for Run For The Kids: 17 March 2024
